platform_tagline: The AI-powered content creation platform for modern teams.
hero_description: SEYA is your personal AI agent for high-quality content generation. Stop staring at a blank page and start creating in seconds.
feature_articles_desc: Generate long-form articles that are SEO-optimized and ready to publish in minutes.
feature_social_desc: Create engaging tweets, threads, and social media posts that capture attention.
feature_youtube_desc: Craft compelling video scripts that keep your audience hooked from start to finish.
features_section_desc: Discover how our versatile AI writing assistant can streamline your content workflow and amplify your creativity.
step1_desc: Provide a simple prompt, keywords, or a brief description of what you need.
step2_desc: SEYA's advanced AI analyzes your input and crafts unique content in seconds.
step3_desc: Review, edit if needed, and share your masterpiece with the world.
Start for free and upgrade when you need: Start for free and upgrade when you need more
testimonial_1_text: "SEYA cut my content creation time in half! The article writer is a game-changer for my blog."
testimonial_2_text: "As a YouTuber, I struggled with scripts. SEYA's Script Pro gives me fantastic ideas and structures to work with."
testimonial_3_text: "Managing social media for multiple clients is tough. The Social Media Genius tool is my secret weapon."
capabilities_hero_desc: Discover the wide range of high-quality content SEYA can generate for you. Explore examples and see the power of AI in action.
capabilities_articles_desc: Informative, persuasive, listicles, and how-to guides.
capabilities_tweets_desc: Generate single tweets or engaging multi-tweet threads.
capabilities_youtube_desc: Create compelling script intros with visual cues and narration.
capabilities_linkedin_desc: Craft professional, thought-leadership posts for your network.
capabilities_instagram_desc: Write short, engaging captions with emojis and hashtags.
capabilities_facebook_desc: Design posts for community engagement and promotion.

Empowering creators with AI-powered cont: Empowering creators with AI-powered content generation
about_mission_text: At SEYA, we believe that everyone deserves access to powerful content creation tools. Our mission is to democratize content creation by providing AI-powered solutions that help individuals and teams produce high-quality content faster and more efficiently.
about_story_p1: SEYA was born from the frustration of spending countless hours creating content for various platforms. We recognized that content creators needed a solution that could adapt to different formats while maintaining quality and authenticity.
about_story_p2: Today, SEYA serves thousands of creators, marketers, and businesses worldwide, helping them streamline their content creation process and focus on what matters most - connecting with their audience.
value_innovation_desc: We continuously push the boundaries of what's possible with AI technology.
value_quality_desc: We're committed to delivering exceptional results that exceed expectations.
value_accessibility_desc: We make powerful tools available to everyone, regardless of technical expertise.
value_community_desc: We believe in building a supportive community of creators helping creators.
contact_hero_subtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
We'd love to hear from you: We'd love to hear from you

privacy_1_intro_text: SEYA ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our Service. Please read this privacy policy carefully.
privacy_2_info_intro: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
privacy_2_info_profile: Profile information you choose to provide
privacy_2_info_content: Content you create, upload, or share through the Service
privacy_2_info_payment: Payment information (processed securely through third-party payment processors)
privacy_3_auto_intro: When you access or use our Service, we automatically collect certain information, including:
privacy_3_auto_log: Log data (IP address, browser type, operating system)
privacy_3_auto_device: Device information (device type, unique device identifiers)
privacy_3_auto_usage: Usage data (pages visited, features used, time spent on the Service)
privacy_4_use_intro: We use the information we collect to:
privacy_4_use_improve: Provide, maintain, and improve our Service
privacy_4_use_transactions: Process transactions and send related information
privacy_4_use_support: Send you technical notices, updates, security alerts, and support messages
privacy_4_use_requests: Respond to your comments, questions, and customer service requests
privacy_4_use_comm: Communicate with you about products, services, offers, and events
privacy_4_use_trends: Monitor and analyze trends, usage, and activities in connection with our Service
privacy_4_use_fraud: Detect, investigate, and prevent fraudulent transactions and other illegal activities
privacy_4_use_personalize: Personalize and improve the Service and provide content or features that match your interests
privacy_5_share_intro: We may share your information in the following circumstances:
privacy_5_share_vendors: With vendors, consultants, and other service providers who need access to such information to carry out work on our behalf
privacy_5_share_law: In response to a request for information if we believe disclosure is in accordance with applicable law
privacy_5_share_policies: If we believe your actions are inconsistent with our user agreements or policies
privacy_5_share_safety: To protect the rights, property, and safety of SEYA or others
privacy_5_share_merger: In connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of company assets, financing, or acquisition
privacy_5_share_consent: With your consent or at your direction
privacy_6_security_text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect the security of your personal information. However, please note that no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure.
privacy_7_retention_text: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.
privacy_8_rights_intro: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, including:
privacy_8_rights_access: The right to access your personal information
privacy_8_rights_correct: The right to correct inaccurate or incomplete information
privacy_8_rights_delete: The right to delete your personal information
privacy_8_rights_restrict: The right to restrict or object to our processing of your information
privacy_9_cookies_text: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our Service and hold certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.
privacy_10_children_text: Our Service is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.
privacy_11_changes_text: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.
privacy_12_contact_text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@seya.ai
terms_1_accept_text: By accessing and using SEYA ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to these Terms of Service, please do not use the Service.
terms_2_license_text: Permission is granted to temporarily access and use the Service for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:
terms_2_license_item2: Use the materials for any commercial purpose or for any public display
terms_2_license_item3: Attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained in the Service
terms_2_license_item4: Remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials
terms_2_license_item5: Transfer the materials to another person or "mirror" the materials on any other server
terms_3_accounts_text1: When you create an account with us, you must provide information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times. Failure to do so constitutes a breach of the Terms, which may result in immediate termination of your account on our Service.
terms_3_accounts_text2: You are responsible for safeguarding the password that you use to access the Service and for any activities or actions under your password.
terms_4_content_text1: Our Service allows you to generate, post, and share content. You are responsible for the content that you generate and share through the Service, including its legality, reliability, and appropriateness.
terms_4_content_text2: By generating and sharing content via the Service, you grant us the right and license to use, modify, publicly perform, publicly display, reproduce, and distribute such content on and through the Service.
terms_5_prohibited_text: You may use the Service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to use the Service:
terms_5_prohibited_item1: In any way that violates any applicable national or international law or regulation
terms_5_prohibited_item2: To transmit, or procure the sending of, any advertising or promotional material without our prior written consent
terms_5_prohibited_item3: To impersonate or attempt to impersonate the Company, a Company employee, another user, or any other person or entity
terms_5_prohibited_item4: To engage in any other conduct that restricts or inhibits anyone's use or enjoyment of the Service
terms_6_payment_text1: Some parts of the Service are billed on a subscription basis. You will be billed in advance on a recurring and periodic basis. Billing cycles are set on a monthly or annual basis, depending on the type of subscription plan you select.
terms_6_payment_text2: A valid payment method is required to process the payment for your subscription. You shall provide accurate and complete billing information.
terms_7_termination_text: We may terminate or suspend your account and bar access to the Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, under our sole discretion, for any reason whatsoever and without limitation, including but not limited to a breach of the Terms.
terms_8_liability_text: In no event shall SEYA, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.
terms_9_changes_text: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. We will provide notice of any significant changes by posting the new Terms of Service on this page.
terms_10_contact_text: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at support@seya.ai
contact_chat_desc: Our friendly team is here to help.
contact_visit_desc: Come say hello at our office HQ.
